## CES-D vs RAPI

CES-D vs RAPI Comparing survey instruments like CES-D and RAPI can be a daunting and time-consuming task for psychologists due to the subjective nature and lengthy harmonisation process. Thanks to the Harmony software, it's now easier to automate this process and provide a more accurate and consistent analysis. Harmony creates a platform for researchers, providing a comprehensive analysis between CES-D and RAPI. It leverages natural language processing and generative AI to compare each item in the instruments. This takes the user's understanding further than just a mere manual comparison by providing a percentage match on each element, even across multilingual queries. In the quest to advance psychology research, comparing CES-D vs RAPI using Harmony's impactful AI techniques presents a streamlined and reliable approach. Thus, researchers are encouraged to leverage this novel tool and pave the way for more uniform interpretations, conclusions and implications of their studies involving CES-D and RAPI.

## Compare the items in CES-D English and RAPI

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_" target="harmonyapp">Import CES-D and RAPI into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_" target="harmonyapp">Import just CES-D into Harmony</a> - compare CES-D English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_" target="harmonyapp">Import just RAPI into Harmony</a> - compare RAPI with other instruments
